channel.title: International Studies Honors help
channel.description:
We have to write a full block letter to an Ambassador of a country, so I chose China. I understand what I am going to say to him, but the full block letter part is rather confusing because so many things are optional and I don't really know what I actually need for the letter. Has someone ever done an assignment like this for school? Can you show me an example?
Thanks ;3
[b]Nevermind, figured it out.[/b]
